366	During	O

366	situation	O
366	in	O
366	Argentina	O
366	,	O
366	the	O
366	Spanish	O
366	president	O
366	told	O
366	De	O
366	la	O
366	Rua	O
366	.	O

367	Following	O
367	the	O
367	formal	O
367	ratification	O
367	of	O
367	the	O
367	Kyoto	O
367	protocol	O
367	by	O
367	all	O
367	the	O
367	parliaments	O
367	of	O
367	the	O
367	concerned	O
367	countries	O
367	,	O
367	that	O
367	protocol	O
367	will	O
367	become	O
367	equivalent	O
367	to	O
367	a	O
367	Belgian	O
367	law	O
367	.	O

368	This	O
368	implies	O
368	--	O
368	whether	O
368	or	O
368	not	O
368	one	O
368	agrees	O
368	with	O
368	it	O
368	--	O
368	that	O
368	the	O
368	Kyoto	O
368	protocol	O
368	will	O
368	become	O
368	binding	O
368	for	O
368	all	O
368	of	O
368	this	O
368	country	O
368	's	O
368	inhabitants	O
368	and	O
368	institutions	O
368	.	O

369	We	O
369	readily	O
369	accept	O
369	that	O
369	there	O
369	are	O
369	good	S-modal
369	intentions	O
369	on	O
369	the	O
369	part	O
369	of	O
369	both	O
369	the	O
369	government	O
369	and	O
369	this	O
369	country	O
369	's	O
369	various	O
369	sectors	O
369	to	O
369	comply	O
369	with	O
369	the	O
369	Kyoto	O
369	standards	O
369	.	O

370	However	O
370	,	O
370	no	O
370	broad	O
370	social	O
370	debate	O
370	has	O
370	yet	O
370	been	O
370	conducted	O
370	on	O
370	the	O
370	crucial	S-modal
370	question	O
370	:	O
370	How	O
370	much	O
370	should	S-modal
370	each	O
370	sector	O
370	or	O
370	target	O
370	group	O
370	contribute	O
370	to	O
370	achieving	O
370	the	O
370	Belgian	O
370	Kyoto	O
370	standard	O
370	.	O

371	That	O
371	is	O
371	strikingly	O
371	illustrated	O
371	by	O
371	Belgian	O
371	large-scale	O
371	industry	O
371	,	O
371	which	O
371	has	O
371	made	O
371	great	O
371	efforts	O
371	over	O
371	the	O
371	past	O
371	10	O
371	years	O
371	,	O
371	over	O
371	which	O
371	energy	O
371	intensity	O
371	(	O
371	energy	O
371	use	O
371	per	O
371	unit	O
371	of	O
371	final	O
371	product	O
371	)	O
371	has	O
371	improved	O
371	considerably	O
371	.	O

372	In	O
372	a	O
372	nutshell	O
372	,	O
372	benchmarking	O
372	means	O
372	that	O
372	companies	O
372	compare	O
372	their	O
372	energy	O
372	efficiency	O
372	with	O
372	that	O
372	of	O
372	similar	O
372	plants	O
372	abroad	O
372	.	O

373	In	O
373	return	O
373	for	O
373	their	O
373	commitment	O
373	,	O
373	they	O
373	are	O
373	exempted	O
373	from	O
373	additional	O
373	(	O
373	Flemish	O
373	)	O
373	emission	O
373	restrictions	O
373	,	O
373	taxes	O
373	on	O
373	emissions	O
373	,	O
373	or	O
373	negotiable	O
373	emission	O
373	rights	O
373	.	O

374	Belgian	O
374	industry	O
374	is	O
374	advocating	O
374	benchmark	O
374	covenants	O
374	because	O
374	it	O
374	is	O
374	afraid	O
374	that	O
374	an	O
374	absolute	O
374	limit	O
374	would	S-modal
374	weaken	O
374	considerably	O
374	its	O
374	competitive	O
374	position	O
374	with	O
374	respect	O
374	to	O
374	similar	O
374	companies	O
374	in	O
374	regions	O
374	where	O
374	the	O
374	Kyoto	O
374	protocol	O
374	is	O
374	not	O
374	ratified	O
374	.	O

375	However	O
375	,	O
375	this	O
375	disregards	O
375	the	O
375	fact	O
375	that	O
375	arguments	O
375	other	O
375	than	O
375	purely	O
375	financial	O
375	ones	O
375	also	O
375	play	O
375	a	O
375	part	O
375	in	O
375	the	O
375	location	O
375	decisions	O
375	of	O
375	companies	O
375	in	O
375	our	O
375	region	O
375	(	O
375	favorable	O
375	location	O
375	near	O
375	seaports	O
375	,	O
375	availability	O
375	of	O
375	know-how	O
375	,	O
375	well-educated	O
375	personnel	O
375	,	O
375	stable	O
375	political	O
375	climate	O
375	...	O
375	)	O
375	.	O

376	Those	O
376	covenants	O
376	contain	O
376	insufficient	S-modal
376	guarantees	O
376	in	O
376	themselves	O
376	to	O
376	achieve	O
376	the	O
376	Belgian/Flemish	O
376	reduction	O
376	targets	O
376	in	O
376	an	O
376	economically	O
376	efficient	O
376	manner	O
376	.	O

377	To	O
377	begin	O
377	with	O
377	,	O
377	the	O
377	principle	O
377	of	O
377	benchmarking	O
377	itself	O
377	raises	O
377	questions	O
377	.	O

378	If	O
378	it	O
378	were	O
378	to	O
378	emerge	O
378	from	O
378	the	O
378	comparison	O
378	with	O
378	domestic	O
378	and	O
378	foreign	O
378	companies	O
378	that	O
378	certain	O
378	companies	O
378	do	O
378	not	O
378	rank	O
378	among	O
378	the	O
378	world	O
378	leaders	O
378	in	O
378	energy	O
378	efficiency	O
378	,	O
378	they	O
378	would	S-modal
378	have	B-modal
378	to	E-modal
378	present	O
378	a	O
378	plan	O
378	to	O
378	achieve	O
378	the	O
378	highest	O
378	energy	O
378	efficiency	O
378	on	O
378	time	O
378	(	O
378	by	O
378	2012	O
378	)	O
378	.	O

379	But	O
379	benchmarking	O
379	is	O
379	not	O
379	sufficient	S-modal
379	from	O
379	the	O
379	viewpoint	O
379	of	O
379	economic	O
379	efficiency	O
379	(	O
379	realizing	O
379	the	O
379	Kyoto	O
379	restrictions	O
379	on	O
379	emissions	O
379	at	O
379	the	O
379	lowest	O
379	possible	S-modal
379	costs	O
379	for	O
379	the	O
379	whole	O
379	of	O
379	society	O
379	)	O
379	.	O

380	A	O
380	cost-efficient	O
380	division	O
380	of	O
380	efforts	O
380	implies	S-modal
380	that	O
380	each	O
380	sector	O
380	must	S-modal
380	limit	O
380	its	O
380	emissions	O
380	to	O
380	the	O
380	point	O
380	at	O
380	which	O
380	the	O
380	additional	O
380	costs	O
380	for	O
380	one	O
380	extra	O
380	ton	O
380	of	O
380	reduction	O
380	are	O
380	the	O
380	same	O
380	in	O
380	all	O
380	sectors	O
380	.	O

381	As	O
381	a	O
381	result	O
381	,	O
381	the	O
381	costs	O
381	of	O
381	additional	O
381	restrictions	O
381	on	O
381	emissions	O
381	in	O
381	industry	O
381	must	S-modal
381	be	O
381	compared	O
381	with	O
381	those	O
381	of	O
381	other	O
381	sectors	O
381	,	O
381	such	O
381	as	O
381	the	O
381	transport	O
381	sector	O
381	,	O
381	households	O
381	,	O
381	the	O
381	service	O
381	sector	O
381	,	O
381	and	O
381	so	O
381	forth	O
381	.	O

382	Benchmarking	O
382	guarantees	O
382	only	O
382	that	O
382	companies	O

863	And	O
